function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exclusion of mental health outcomes","Impact":"Neglecting mental health impact of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Include mental health assessments in future studies","Technologies":"Mental health assessment tools","People":"Patients, healthcare workers","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Exclusion of SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV studies","Impact":"Loss of potential insights into related contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Include relevant studies for comprehensive analysis","Technologies":"SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV research data","People":"Researchers, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Use of inexperienced researchers for screening","Impact":"Risk of overlooking important studies and data","Mitigation":"Provide thorough training and supervision for researchers","Technologies":"Screening software, training programs","People":"Postgraduate researchers, research supervisors","Owner":"Research institutions, academic institutions"}]}
